trans-unit.source: Represents a Microsoft Access database for use with data-bound controls.
trans-unit.target: Representerer en Microsoft Access-database for bruk med databundet kontroller.

trans-unit.source: The AccessDataSource class is a data source control that works with Microsoft Access databases.
trans-unit.target: AccessDataSource klassen er en kontroll av data-datakilde fungerer med Microsoft Access-databaser.

trans-unit.source: Like its base class, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>, the AccessDataSource control uses SQL queries to perform data retrieval.
trans-unit.target: Som basisklassen, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>, AccessDataSource kontrollen bruker SQL-spørringer til å utføre datahenting.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>

trans-unit.source: One of the unique characteristics of the AccessDataSource control is that you do not set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource.ConnectionString%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Én av de unike egenskapene kontrollens AccessDataSource er at du ikke angir den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource.ConnectionString%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource.ConnectionString%2A>

trans-unit.source: All you need to do is set the location of the Access (.mdb) file in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource.DataFile%2A> property and the AccessDataSource takes care of the underlying connection to the database.
trans-unit.target: Trenger du opprette plasseringen av Access-databaseinformasjon ()-filen i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource.DataFile%2A>egenskapen og AccessDataSource ved hjelp av den underliggende tilkoblingen til databasen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource.DataFile%2A>

trans-unit.source: You should place Access databases in the App_Data directory of the Web site and reference them by a relative path (for example, `~/App_Data/Northwind.mdb`).
trans-unit.target: Du bør plassere Access-databaser i mappen App_Data av webområdet og referere til dem ved en relativ bane (for eksempel `~/App_Data/Northwind.mdb`).

trans-unit.source: This location offers additional security for data files, because they are not served if they are requested directly by the client Web browser.
trans-unit.target: Denne plasseringen gir ekstra sikkerhet for datafiler, fordi de ikke behandles hvis de forespørres direkte fra nettleseren klienten.

trans-unit.source: The AccessDataSource class does not support connecting to Access databases that are protected by a user name or password, because you cannot set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource.ConnectionString%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Klassen AccessDataSource støtter ikke tilkobling til Access-databaser som er beskyttet av et brukernavn eller passord, fordi du ikke kan angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource.ConnectionString%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource.ConnectionString%2A>

trans-unit.source: If your Access database is protected by a user name or password, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control to connect to it so that you can specify a complete connection string.
trans-unit.target: Hvis Access-databasen er beskyttet av et brukernavn eller passord, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>kontrollen skal tilkobles, slik at du kan angi en fullstendig tilkoblingsstreng.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>

trans-unit.source: You bind data-bound controls to an AccessDataSource using the `DataSourceID` property of the data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: Du binde databundet til et AccessDataSource ved hjelp av den `DataSourceID` databindingselementer-kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: For more information about binding a data-bound control to data source controls, see [Binding to Data Using a Data Source Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/e41adfff-8fb8-449e-9cd1-9bd49788c5f7).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om binde en kontroll databundet til kilden Kontroller [Binding til Data ved hjelp av en Data Source Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/e41adfff-8fb8-449e-9cd1-9bd49788c5f7).

trans-unit.source: Because the AccessDataSource control is specific to only one database product, it always uses the same provider—the <xref:System.Data.OleDb?displayProperty=fullName> .NET data provider.
trans-unit.target: Fordi AccessDataSource kontrollen er spesifikk for bare én Databaseprodukt, bruker det samme leverandøren alltid – den <xref:System.Data.OleDb?displayProperty=fullName>.NET-dataleverandør.</xref:System.Data.OleDb?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For this reason, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource.ProviderName%2A> property is read-only.
trans-unit.target: På grunn av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource.ProviderName%2A>egenskapen er skrivebeskyttet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource.ProviderName%2A>

trans-unit.source: When using the <xref:System.Data.OleDb?displayProperty=fullName> provider, the order of the parameters in a parameterized SQL statement is significant; any parameterized SQL queries that you specify in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.SelectCommand%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.UpdateCommand%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.InsertCommand%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.DeleteCommand%2A> properties must match the order of any <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter> objects that are in the corresponding parameter collection.
trans-unit.target: Når du bruker den <xref:System.Data.OleDb?displayProperty=fullName>leverandør, rekkefølgen av parameterne i en parametriserte SQL-setningen er viktig; noen parametriserte SQL-spørringer som du angir i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.SelectCommand%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.UpdateCommand%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.InsertCommand%2A>, og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.DeleteCommand%2A>Egenskaper må samsvare med rekkefølgen på noen <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>objektene i den tilsvarende Parametersamlingen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.DeleteCommand%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.InsertCommand%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.UpdateCommand%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.SelectCommand%2A> </xref:System.Data.OleDb?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If no parameter collection is specified on the AccessDataSource, the order of parameters that are supplied to these operations must match the order in which they appear in the underlying SQL statement.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ingen parameteren samling er angitt for AccessDataSource, rekkefølgen på parametere som er angitt for disse operasjonene må samsvare med rekkefølgen som de vises i den underliggende SQL-setningen.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Parameters with the SqlDataSource Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [ved hjelp av parametere med SqlDataSource kontrollen](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The AccessDataSource control supports the same caching behavior that its base class supports.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollen AccessDataSource støtter samme hurtigbufring virkemåte som basisklassen støtter.

trans-unit.source: Use caching to increase the performance of pages that use the AccessDataSource control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk hurtigbufring for å øke ytelse på sider som bruker AccessDataSource kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: For more information about data source caching, see [Caching Data Using Data Source Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/8f534a06-3136-4048-bb2e-6563a8238d15).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon om hurtigbufring av data-kilden, se [hurtigbufring Data ved hjelp av datakildekontroller](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/8f534a06-3136-4048-bb2e-6563a8238d15).

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the features of the AccessDataSource control.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor beskriver funksjonene kontrollens AccessDataSource.

trans-unit.source: |Capability|Requirements| |----------------|------------------| |Sorting|Set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DataSourceMode%2A> property to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceMode> value.| |Filtering|Set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.FilterExpression%2A> property to a filtering expression used to filter the data when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select%2A> method is called.| |Paging|The AccessDataSource does not support direct paging operations on an Access database.
trans-unit.target: | Funksjonen | Krav | |----------------|------------------| | Sortering | Egenskapen <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DataSourceMode%2A>til verdien <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceMode>. | | Filtrering | Egenskapen <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.FilterExpression%2A>til en filtrering som brukes til å filtrere dataene når metoden <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select%2A>kalles. | | Bla | AccessDataSource støtter ikke direkte sidevekslingsoperasjoner på en Access-database.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.FilterExpression%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DataSourceMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: A data-bound control, such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>, can page over the items returned by the AccessDataSource, if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DataSourceMode%2A> property is set to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceMode> value.| |Updating|Set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.UpdateCommand%2A> property to a SQL statement used to update data.
trans-unit.target: En databundet kontroll, for eksempel <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>, kan siden over elementer som returneres av AccessDataSource, hvis egenskapen <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DataSourceMode%2A>er satt til verdien <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceMode>. | | Oppdatering | Angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.UpdateCommand%2A>egenskapen til en SQL-setning brukes til å oppdatere dataene.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.UpdateCommand%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DataSourceMode%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: This statement is typically parameterized.| |Deleting|Set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DeleteCommand%2A> property to a SQL statement used to delete data.
trans-unit.target: Denne setningen parametriseres vanligvis. | | Sletting av | Angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DeleteCommand%2A>egenskapen til en SQL-setning brukes til å slette data.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DeleteCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: This statement is typically parameterized.| |Inserting|Set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.InsertCommand%2A> property to a SQL statement used to insert data.
trans-unit.target: Denne setningen parametriseres vanligvis. | | Setter inn | Angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.InsertCommand%2A>egenskapen til en SQL-setning brukes til å sette inn data.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.InsertCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: This statement is typically parameterized.| |Caching|Set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DataSourceMode%2A> property to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceMode> value, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.EnableCaching%2A> property to `true`, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.CacheDuration%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.CacheExpirationPolicy%2A> properties according to the caching behavior you want for your cached data.| As with all data source controls, the AccessDataSource control is associated with a strongly typed data source view class.
trans-unit.target: Denne setningen parametriseres vanligvis. | | Hurtigbufring | Angi egenskapen <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DataSourceMode%2A> <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceMode>-verdi, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.EnableCaching%2A>-egenskapen til `true`, og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.CacheDuration%2A>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.CacheExpirationPolicy%2A>Egenskaper i henhold til hurtigbufring virkemåten du vil bruke for bufrede data. | Som med alle datakildekontroller AccessDataSource kontrollen som er knyttet til en klasse for forespørselsparameter av sterk type datakilde visningen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.CacheExpirationPolicy%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.CacheDuration%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.EnableCaching%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DataSourceMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: Just as the AccessDataSource control extends the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSourceView> class extends the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView> class.
trans-unit.target: Like AccessDataSource kontrollen utvider <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>kontrollen <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSourceView>klassen utvider <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView>klasse.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSourceView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSourceView> class overrides a few of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView> methods to use the <xref:System.Data.OleDb?displayProperty=fullName> .NET data provider.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSourceView>klasse overstyrer noen av de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView>metoder for å bruke den <xref:System.Data.OleDb?displayProperty=fullName>.NET-dataleverandør.</xref:System.Data.OleDb?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSourceView>

trans-unit.source: There is no visual rendering of the AccessDataSource control; it is implemented as a control to enable declarative persistence and to permit, optionally, participation in state management.
trans-unit.target: Det finnes ingen visual gjengivelse av AccessDataSource-kontrollen. Det er implementert som en kontroll å aktivere deklarerende utholdenhet og at du kan også deltakelse i tilstanden management.

trans-unit.source: As a result, you cannot set properties that support visual features, such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl.EnableTheming%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl.SkinID%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Resultatet du kan ikke angi egenskaper som støtter visuelle funksjoner, for eksempel den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl.EnableTheming%2A>og <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl.SkinID%2A>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl.SkinID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl.EnableTheming%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## Declarative Syntax ```                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              ```
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource"></xref> class with the specified data file path and **Select** command.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource"> </xref> klassen med den angitte filbanen og **Velg** kommandoen.

trans-unit.source: The location of the Access .mdb file.
trans-unit.target: Plasseringen av Access MDB-filen.

trans-unit.source: The location can be relative to the current Web form's folder, an absolute physical path, or a virtual path.
trans-unit.target: Plasseringen kan være i forhold til den gjeldende webskjema mappe, en fullstendig fysisk bane eller en virtuell bane.

trans-unit.source: The SQL query used to retrieve data from the Access database.
trans-unit.target: SQL-spørring som brukes til å hente data Access-database.

trans-unit.source: If the SQL query is a parameterized SQL string, add <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref> objects to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.SelectParameters*> collection.
trans-unit.target: Hvis SQL-spørringen er en parametriserte SQL-streng, legger du til <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"> </xref> objekter til den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.SelectParameters*>samlingen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.SelectParameters*>

trans-unit.source: dataFile is or an empty string.
trans-unit.target: dataFileer eller en tom streng.

trans-unit.source: Gets the connection string that is used to connect to the Microsoft Access database.
trans-unit.target: Henter tilkoblingsstrengen som brukes til å koble til Microsoft Access-database.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource> control can be used only with the <xref:System.Data.OleDb?displayProperty=fullName> .NET data provider, and the connection string that <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource> uses is specific to this provider.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource>kontrollen kan bare brukes med den <xref:System.Data.OleDb?displayProperty=fullName>.NET-dataleverandør, og tilkoblingen streng som <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource>bruker er spesifikk for denne leverandøren.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource> </xref:System.Data.OleDb?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource> control exposes connection string settings, such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource.DataFile%2A> property, as a property and constructs a connection string at run time using the values of the ConnectionString property, if set.
trans-unit.target: Derfor den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource>kontrollen viser streng tilkoblingsinnstillinger som den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource.DataFile%2A>, som en egenskap og konstruksjoner tilkobling streng ved kjøretid bruker verdiene i ConnectionString-egenskapen Hvis sette.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource.DataFile%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource>

trans-unit.source: The OLE DB connection string that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource"></xref> control uses to connect to an Access database, through the <xref href="System.Data.OleDb"></xref> .NET data provider.
trans-unit.target: OLE DB-tilkoblingen streng som den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource"> </xref> kontrollen bruker til å koble til en Access-database via den <xref href="System.Data.OleDb"> </xref> .NET-dataleverandøren.

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to set the ConnectionString property.
trans-unit.target: Forsøkte å angi ConnectionString-egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: Creates a data source view object that is associated with the data source control.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en visning datakildeobjektet som er knyttet til datakilde-kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Classes that derive from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource> class can override the CreateDataSourceView method to return strongly typed data source view objects.
trans-unit.target: Klasser som er avledet fra den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource>klassen kan overstyre metoden CreateDataSourceView for å returnere forespørselsparameter av sterk type datakilde visningen dataobjekter.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource>

trans-unit.source: The name of the data source view.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på datakildevisningen.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSourceView"></xref> object that is associated with the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSourceView"> </xref> objekt som er knyttet til den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource"> </xref> forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the location of the Microsoft Access .mdb file.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir plasseringen av Microsoft Access MDB-filen.

trans-unit.source: The location of the Access .mdb file.
trans-unit.target: Plasseringen av Access MDB-filen.

trans-unit.source: Absolute, relative, and virtual paths are supported.
trans-unit.target: Absolutt relativ og virtuelle baner støttes.

trans-unit.source: An invalid path was given.
trans-unit.target: En ugyldig bane er angitt.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbProviderFactory"></xref> object that is associated with the .NET data provider that is identified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.ProviderName*> property.
trans-unit.target: Henter en <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbProviderFactory"> </xref> objektet som er knyttet til .NET-dataleverandør som er identifisert av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.ProviderName*>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.ProviderName*>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbFactory"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbFactory"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the .NET data provider that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource"></xref> control uses to connect to a Microsoft Access database.
trans-unit.target: Henter navnet på .NET-dataleverandør som den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource"> </xref> kontrollen bruker til å koble til en Microsoft Access-database.

trans-unit.source: While the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource> control exposes the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.ProviderName%2A> property because it is inherited from its base class, attempting to set the ProviderName property results in a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> exception.
trans-unit.target: Mens den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource>kontrollere viser den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.ProviderName%2A>egenskapen fordi den er arvet fra basisklassen, forsøk på å angi ProviderName egenskapen resulterer i en <xref:System.NotSupportedException>unntak.</xref:System.NotSupportedException> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.ProviderName%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource>

trans-unit.source: The string "System.Data.OleDb".
trans-unit.target: Strengen "System.Data.OleDb".

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to set the ProviderName property.
trans-unit.target: Forsøkte å angi egenskapen ProviderName.

trans-unit.source: The SqlCacheDependency property overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.SqlCacheDependency*> property.
trans-unit.target: SqlCacheDependency egenskapen overstyrer den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.SqlCacheDependency*>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.SqlCacheDependency*>

trans-unit.source: In the base class, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>, the SqlCacheDependency property gets or sets a semicolon-delimited string that indicates which databases and tables to use for the Microsoft SQL Server cache dependency.
trans-unit.target: I basisklassen, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>, egenskapen SqlCacheDependency henter eller angir en semikolondelt streng som angir hvilken databaser og tabellene som skal brukes for Microsoft SQL Server-hurtigbuffer avhengigheten.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>

trans-unit.source: Cache dependency is not supported by Microsoft Access, and any access to the SqlCacheDependency property results in a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> exception.
trans-unit.target: Hurtigbufferavhengighet støttes ikke av Microsoft Access, og tilgang til egenskapen SqlCacheDependency resulterer i en <xref:System.NotSupportedException>unntak.</xref:System.NotSupportedException>

trans-unit.source: Throws a <xref:System.NotSupportedException>, in all cases.
trans-unit.target: Oppstår en <xref:System.NotSupportedException>, i alle tilfellene.</xref:System.NotSupportedException>

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to get or set the SqlCacheDependency property.
trans-unit.target: Ble gjort forsøk på å hente eller angi egenskapen SqlCacheDependency.
